alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:51AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hardin and southwestern Decatur Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 251 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sardis, or 9 miles north of Savannah, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Walnut Grove, Olive Hill, Saltillo, Thurman, Lowryville, Sibley, Phillips, Center Star, Five Forks, Pleasant Grove, Swift, Olivehill, Bucktown, Cerro Gordo and Coffee Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
